## About

Welcome to my blog! I’m Jethro Emmanuel, and I love using technology to explore and visualize data. I’ll be sharing my experiences and knowledge here.

I’m a big fan of open-source software, especially the R programming language and QGIS. As a Linux user, I value the freedom and customization that open-source tools provide.

On this site I keep a list of [my publications](papers), as well as a [technical blog](blog.html).

<p></p>
